meanings.definition: The act of springing up or rising suddenly.
meanings.sent1: The upspringing of the squirrel startled me.
meanings.sent2: The upspringing of the flowers in spring is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The upspringing of the toast made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an upspringing of joy.
meanings.sent5: The upspringing of the rocket was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The upspringing of new businesses is good for the economy.
meanings.sent2: We witnessed an upspringing of interest in the project.
meanings.sent3: The upspringing of popcorn surprised us all.
meanings.sent4: The upspringing of ideas in her mind was like a fountain.
meanings.sent5: The upspringing of the wave caught us off guard.
